basic_info.title: ScriptCraft AI
basic_info.author: Supremebbb096b
basic_info.description:
Welcome to ScriptCraft AI, your AI-powered screenwriting partner!
Effortlessly turn your ideas into well-structured scripts for film, stage, or short videos. Move past writer’s block with instant story outlines, richer characters, dynamic conflicts, and automatic script formatting—tailored to your creative vision.
Simply share your genre, key settings, and character relationships. The more details you provide, the more personalized and powerful your results.
Bring your stories to life, faster and smarter than ever before!
basic_info.short_description: Crafts stories, develops plots, designs characters, formats scripts.

insights.title: Low Engagement Rate
